name: Evil West
summary: A dark menace consumes the Old West. In solo or coop, fight with style in visceral, explosive combat against bloodthirsty monstrosities. Eradicate the vampiric hordes with your lightning-fueled gauntlet and become a Wild West Superhero.
info:
• 中文名: 暗邪西部
  • 开发: Flying Wild Hog
